sentences.en: "It has very good range and is extremely popular with airlines because of its versatility, " he said.
sentences.cn: “它有很好的服务范围并因其多功能性而受到航空公司的青睐，”他说。

sentences.en: Aileen stands out for her incredible versatility as an actress.

sentences.en: For versatility and genius in acting, writing, directing and producing The Circus.

sentences.en: Its versatility, flexibility, and wide range of implementations and environments make it difficult to describe procedures to cover all cases.

sentences.en: Their versatility makes them extremely useful for medical research.
